content: Create React dashboard directory structure and setup TypeScript configuration
Install and configure dependencies (React 18+, Material-UI, Chart.js, Zustand, etc.)
Create type definitions for dashboard data and API responses
Build API service layer for backend integration
Create state management with Zustand for dashboard data
Build main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation
Create KPI summary cards with trend indicators
Build interactive charts components (line, bar, pie charts)
Create data tables with sorting and filtering capabilities
Implement date range selector and filtering controls
Add export functionality for reports and data
Implement responsive design and professional styling
Add error handling and loading states throughout the dashboard
Create real-time updates mechanism for live data
